description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Oft Horizon: Precursor recreates the longing solitude and serenity of an uncharted voyage into the unknown. Navigate through placid blue waters and violent storms within a small systems run universe. Encounter other player ships online, while sailing, exploring, battling, bartering, and researching, to cultivate your crew and ships to a seaworthy corps.
description.short: Oft Horizon: Precursor recreates the longing solitude and serenity of an uncharted voyage into the unknown. Navigate through placid blue waters and violent storms within a small systems run universe. Encounter other player ships online, while sailing, exploring, battling, bartering, and researching, to cultivate your crew and ships to a seaworthy corps.
